events.title: Iron Man
events.description:
Spider-Man is a superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, created by writer-editor Stan Lee and artist Steve Ditko
. The character's real name is Peter Parker, a teenage orphan who gains superhuman strength, speed, agility, and the ability to cling to walls after being bitten by a radioactive spider
. Spider-Man is known for his arachnid abilities and his personal struggles, as well as his relationships with various superheroes and supervillains.
Key aspects of Spider-Man's character include:
Origins: Peter Parker is an orphan who lives with his widowed Aunt May. After being bitten by a radioactive spider, he develops superhuman abilities and decides to use them to help others
 Enemies: Spider-Man fights various superpowered and non-superpowered supervillains, such as the Green Goblin, Doctor Octopus, Sandman, Chameleon, Lizard, Vulture, Kraven the Hunter, Electro, and Mysterio

.Relationships: Spider-Man has a complex relationship with the billionaire industrialist Tony Stark, who deduces his secret identity and approaches him for assistance in a confrontation with Captain America and other rogue Avengers

.Personal Life: Peter's personal life is marked by struggles, including balancing his heroic duties with his personal relationships and the challenges of living as a young man with incredible abilities

.Spider-Man has been adapted into various forms of media, including animated television series, live-action films, video games, and a Broadway musical

.The character has also been reimagined in modern retellings, such as the Ultimate Spider-Man series, which features a more diverse and contemporary version of Peter Parker Peter Parker
